<div class="container"> <div>例子1： 自定义拓展查询职业等级</div> <nzx-configurable-query [controls]="controls" (queryParamsChange)="queryParams=$event"> <ng-template nzxControl="level" let-formControl> <nz-rate [formControl]="formControl" nzAllowHalf></nz-rate> </ng-template> </nzx-configurable-query> 查询参数： <pre> {{queryParams|json}} </pre> <div>例子2： 一行展示</div> <nzx-configurable-query [nzxCollapse]="false" [controls]="controls2" (queryParamsChange)="queryParams2=$event"> </nzx-configurable-query> 查询参数： <pre> {{queryParams2|json}} </pre> <div>例子3： 全展示禁用折叠</div> <nzx-configurable-query [nzxCollapse]="false" [nzxBtnSpan]="24" [controls]=" controls3" (queryParamsChange)="queryParams3=$event"> <ng-template nzxControl="level" let-formControl> <nz-rate [formControl]="formControl" nzAllowHalf></nz-rate> </ng-template> </nzx-configurable-query> 查询参数： <pre> {{queryParams3|json}} </pre> <div>例子4： 一行展示两个control</div> <nzx-configurable-query [controls]="controls4" [lineNumber]="2" [nzxBtnSpan]="24" (queryParamsChange)="queryParams4=$event"> <ng-template nzxControl="level" let-formControl> <nz-rate [formControl]="formControl" nzAllowHalf></nz-rate> </ng-template> </nzx-configurable-query> 查询参数： <pre> {{queryParams4|json}} </pre> <div>例子5： 简化查询</div> <nzx-configurable-query [controls]="controls5" [lineNumber]="2" [nzxBtnSpan]="24" (queryParamsChange)="queryParams5=$event"> <ng-template nzxControl="level" let-formControl> <nz-rate [formControl]="formControl" nzAllowHalf></nz-rate> </ng-template> </nzx-configurable-query> 查询参数： <pre> {{queryParams5|json}} </pre> <div>例子6： 初始化界面主动查询</div> <nzx-configurable-query [controls]="controls6" [lineNumber]="2" [initQuery]="true" (queryParamsChange)="queryParams6=$event"> <ng-template nzxControl="level" let-formControl> <nz-rate [formControl]="formControl" nzAllowHalf></nz-rate> </ng-template> </nzx-configurable-query> 查询参数： <pre> {{queryParams6|json}} </pre> <div>例子7： 模拟远程加载下拉</div> <nzx-configurable-query [controls]="controls7" [initQuery]="true" [nzxCollapse]="false" (queryParamsChange)="queryParams7=$event"> </nzx-configurable-query> 查询参数： <pre> {{queryParams7|json}} </pre> </div>
